original_text: Therefore when we could bear it no longer, we were willing to be left behind at Athens alone,
korean_text: 이러므로 우리가 참다 못하여 우리만 아덴에 머물기를 좋게 생각하고

sentences.original_text: Therefore when we could bear it no longer,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리가 더 이상 참을 수 없게 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: we were willing to be left behind at Athens alone,
